programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaos's journey. From humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Former two-time UK champion returns to the arena, and after losing its title in the last series, they have a score to settle. Will another robot foil their plans and take their spot in the finals?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The four way melee shows how closely matched the robots are in a nail-biting first round. Mr Psycho gets an opportunity to use his colossal hammer against a competitor. The arena suffers more damage from one of the robots devastating weapon.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight more competitors take on the four way melees to try and secure a spot in the final. A robot seemingly eliminates itself from the competition. The judges make difficult decisions in yet another well-matched heat.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One newcomer braves the arena against seven veterans in this heat. Mr. Psycho continues to smash any robot unfortunate to get close, cementing his position as a feared house robot.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An even number of newcomers and veterans prepare themselves to do battle. House robots once again team up against the vulnerable robots, only to be saved by the ever generous Refbot.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The judges make a controversial decision during the four way melee. Some robots are too strong for their own good as their weapons damage their opponents and also themselves. An intense heat final will decide a worthy winner.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Despite being teamed up on, a competitor manages to outsmart their opponents. Sergeant Bash gets a taste of his own medicine. The house robots play a vital role in deciding the winner of the heat finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Three axe robots meet in round one as they attempt to chop each other out of the competition. In the semi-finals Growler gets their first real taste of metal.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A competitor feels the heat of the house robots in the first round. One competitor’s weapon easily immobilizes their opponent, leaving it for the house robots to play with. Two similar robots meet in the final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight more competitors brave the Robot Wars arena. One of the robot’s attacks backfires in the semi-finals, leading to a tight final with an unexpected conclusion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One newcomer makes it to the semi-finals, will they hold their own against the veterans? Two-time World Champions and Fifth Wars Champions Razer battle first as they attempt to gain yet another title.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An all veteran, action-packed semi-final. The house robots do not hesitate to get involved as the competitors do anything it takes to eliminate their opponents. The Loser’s Melee gives knocked out competitors a chance for redemption.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: 96 Robots, down to four. The Grand Final is here and the competition is fierce, only the best robot will survive and win the title of Robot Wars: The Sixth Wars champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: The Sixth Wars - UK vs Germany
programme.desc: Four robots from Germany, four robots from the UK. The competitors will fight their fellow compatriots for a chance to represent their country in a Germany against UK final, to decide which country has the most ferocious machine.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Learn more about this infamous Robot and the family that built it. With an unforgettable design and devastating weapon, this competitor became an instant icon.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Debuting in the Second Wars, to becoming the most successful Robot ever to take part in Robot Wars. This Robot put the squeeze on all the competition, including the House Robots.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaos's journey. From humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The first heat of the All-Stars Championship, this heat determines which two robots go through to All-stars grand-final. Veteran robots all enter the arena once again as they put their experience to the test against each other.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six more renowned robots fight their way through the heats to fight for a chance to be the All-Star champion. One competitor in particular strikes fear into the roster. The two winners of each heat face off for the title in the Grand Final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Extreme Series continues with the Annihilator; a knockout competition between six competitors, over the course of four rounds and a final, six will be reduced to one, the annihilator champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A knockout tournament with children at the helm. Will the house robots go easy on the kids, or will they just be easy targets?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Learn more about this infamous Robot and the family that built it. With an unforgettable design and devastating weapon, this competitor became an instant icon.
